name: Chasing Comedy
description:
Chasing Comedy is an RPG about a clown who has to ditch his dad's ashes some place. The game heavily features clowns, though very few of them make focused attempts at being funny. The combat system does not incentivize mashing attack or random skills, instead insisting that you respect and properly utilize each party member's strengths. But if that sounds BORING then there's a cheat code to let you just one-shot most enemies. Oh yeah, there are cheats codes.

Created for the '30 Day RPG Maker Themed Game Jam #5'.
